item.title: As the world inches back to a pre-WW2 order, the 'middle powers' face a grave new challenge
item.description: With economic stagnation and extremes of inequality comes corrosion of trust in democratic institutions. So Trump may be a symptom, not a cause, of what Carney called a “rupture” with the post-WW2 order.

item.title: The World’s Oldest Cave Art, Discovered in Indonesia, Is at Least 67,800 Years Old - Open Culture
item.description: The World’s Oldest Cave Art, Discovered in Indonesia, Is at Least 67,800 Years Old Open CultureAncient handprints suggest humans were thinking symbolically thousands of years earlier than science taught Fox NewsRock art from at least 67,800 years ago in Sulawesi NatureOldest cave painting of red claw hand could rewrite human creativity timeline BBCHand stencil made almost 68,000 years ago is the oldest cave art ever found NBC News
